item.description:
Please join us for our first Annual Members Only event at the ever popular Gennaro's Eatery in Quincy.

Gennaro's is a favorite of many in the group and we're happy to revisit it with our Annual Members. The food here is hearty and unfussy compared to some other area restaurants featuring higher prices, but if the cost is smaller, the flavor is not.

Please note that Gennaro's does a brisk business: They do not take reservations and we may have a wait depending on how busy the evening is. But please be on time, because they'll only seat complete parties. I'll give them the count of our party at 7:00 and we'll have to sit as soon as a table is available. I can't make any promises to stragglers!

Since this event is for [2011] Annual Members only, there is no Event Fee associated with this Meetup. You pay only for what you order, plus your share of the tip.

See you there!

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 

Gennaro's Eatery

12 Blanchard Rd

Quincy, MA 02169

(617) 773-1500

Website: Gennaro's Eatery

 

Organizer: Mike

Guests: This event is currently not open to guests.

Price Range: Most entrees under $15.00.

Event Fee: None!

Cash Only Policy: Please bring cash! Paying for all of our meals in cash has been SSDOMG'S policy for over five years. It allows us to avoid the confusion of having the waitstaff run multiple credit card slips and generally helps to keep things simpler for everyone.

RSVP Deadline: Monday, September 26thth @ 7:00 pm. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by the Event Organizer. Changes to "No" after the deadline will be considered No-Shows per our guidelines on the About Us page.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions: Gennaro's is located at the Intersection of Blanchard Road and Quincy Avenue in Quincy.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Annual Members Only: Gennaro's Eatery
